name: **Illaunnagappul – _Oileán na gCapall_**
description: Illaunnagappul – Oileán na gCapall L897-357 Sheet 44 A small island N of Illaunmore. Uninhabited but there are signs of former fields. Neglected, it has lost the charm it undoubtedly once possessed. A flow of about 1.5kn can develop just S of the island. Land anywhere, easily on higher tides, with more difficulty onto weed-covered rocks on lower tides.
